api_list.name: get_Radio_byLanguage
api_list.description:
Get Stations by language.
Example: Spanish, English or Chinese

api_list.name: get_All_Radios
get_All_Countries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://55-000-world-radio-stations-fm-am-api.p.rapidapi.com/radioquery/getCountries.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "55-000-world-radio-stations-fm-am-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://55-000-world-radio-stations-fm-am-api.p.rapidapi.com/radioquery/getCountries.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "55-000-world-radio-stations-fm-am-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get_Country_by_Id
api_list.description: get Countries by ID, id that you can see in "countryID"

api_list.name: search_By_Name
api_list.description:
Search the radio station By name.
Remember to convert spaces to WEB Style..
Example "Gospel Radio". you should input "Gospel%20radio"

api_list.name: get_Country_by_Name
get_TopsWorldWide
api_list.description: You can just execute this to get Top Worldwide clicked rádios, and you can put the "countryCode" to get Top rádio from the Selected Country.
